pages.text: $(l)CTRL$() - Speed Up Gait $(br2)$(l)Left ALT$() - Slow Down Gait $(br2)$(l)B$() - Bow Emote $(br2)$(l)P$() - Piaffe Emote G - Wave Emote $(br2)$(l)L$() - Levade Emote $(br2)$(l)Down Arrow (whilst walking)$() - Spanish Walk (Horses Only)
Along with speeding up and slowing down, equines can do quite a few emotes.
